title: The Musicians in the woods
creator_credit: Gakken Company and Coronet Instructional Films
brief_description: Animated puppets enact the Grimm fairy tale about the forsaken animals who set out to make their way in the world. The adventures in which the donkey, cat, dog, and rooster outwit a band of htieves and gain a fortune is told here in colorful and amusing fashion.
